Detailed Description

The meta information of a packet stored in the conn_struct connection structure.

pkt_struct

Parameters:
packet,pointer to the packet
origin,to define from where the packet is coming (EXT, LIH or HIH)
data,to provide the number of bytes in the packet
DE,(0) if the packet was received before the decision to redirect, (1) otherwise
